p: The total nitrogen deposition in Morteys and Grimsel areas for the year 2007 amounted on average to 10.4 and 6.8 kg N·ha −1·year −1, respectively (according to Roth et al. 2013; data from FOEN Federal Office for the Environment). Data for the Réchy area were not calculated, but are comparable to those of Grimsel area because of the similar elevations and distance to main towns.
